title.description: Unlock the world of investments with our online trading technology.

about.title: Trade in 170+ Markets from a Single Account
about.description: Since 1995, AGM as an International Securities Broker/Dealer has facilitated direct access to more than 170 financial exchanges in the USA, Europe, Asia, and Latin America, otherwise inaccessible to certain investors.
about.description_2: With our top of the line trading platforms and services, AGM lets you trade and invest 24/7 in a wide range of financial instruments accross 20+ different currencies from a single account.

steps.title: Accounts for All Types of Investors
steps.description: First, read about the different account management types and choose the one that best suits your needs
steps.after_selecting_management_type: Then, after choosing your management type, choose the account type that best suits your needs

broker.title: Broker
broker.short_description: Anyone can trade using our broker services where you manage your own account and trade at your own disclosure.
broker.long_description: With a Broker account, you have full control over your investment decisions. You independently manage your portfolio, execute trades, and make all strategic decisions. AGM provides the platform, tools, and market access you need, while you retain complete autonomy over your account.

highlights.1: Full control over your portfolio and trading decisions
highlights.2: Access to 150+ global financial markets from a single account
highlights.3: Real-time market data and professional trading tools
highlights.4: Trade stocks, ETFs, options, futures, bonds, and more
highlights.6: Ideal for experienced investors who prefer self-directed trading

advisor.title: Advisor
advisor.short_description: Anyone can trade using our advisor services where you manage your own account and trade at your own disclosure.
advisor.long_description: With an Advisor account, you have full control over your investment decisions. You independently manage your portfolio, execute trades, and make all strategic decisions. AGM provides the platform, tools, and market access you need, while you retain complete autonomy over your account.

highlights.1: Full control over your portfolio and trading decisions
highlights.2: Access to 150+ global financial markets from a single account
highlights.3: Real-time market data and professional trading tools
highlights.4: Trade stocks, ETFs, options, futures, bonds, and more
highlights.6: Ideal for experienced investors who prefer self-directed trading

individual.title: Individual & Joint Personal Accounts
individual.short_description: Open a trading account for yourself or with a relative.
individual.long_description: Personal accounts are designed for individual investors or pairs of investors (such as spouses or family members) who want to access global financial markets. An Individual account is owned by a single person, while a Joint account allows two people to co-own and manage the account together, making it convenient for shared financial goals.

highlights.1: Individual Account: Sole ownership with full control over all trades and withdrawals
highlights.2: Joint Account: Shared ownership between two individuals with equal rights
highlights.3: Access to all available financial instruments and markets
highlights.5: Flexible deposit and withdrawal options to your personal bank account
highlights.6: Suitable for personal savings, investment, and wealth building

institutional.title: Institutional Accounts
institutional.short_description: Open a trading account for your trust or institution.
institutional.long_description: Institutional accounts are designed for legal entities such as trusts, corporations, LLCs, partnerships, and other organizations. These accounts provide the same powerful market access as personal accounts but are structured to meet the legal and operational requirements of institutional investors, including proper documentation and compliance frameworks.

highlights.1: Available for trusts, corporations, LLCs, and partnerships
highlights.2: Structured to meet institutional compliance and legal requirements
highlights.3: Supports multiple authorized traders and signatories
highlights.5: Access to all global markets and financial instruments
highlights.6: Dedicated support for institutional setup and onboarding

products.title: Professional Trading Platforms
products.description: We offer award winning platforms that allow you to trade, view your portfolio and manage your account - on any device.

trader.title: AGM Trader Pro
trader.description: AGM Trader Pro is a professional trading platform for desktop and mobile devices. It allows you to trade stocks, ETFs, options, futures, bonds, and more.

mobile.title: AGM Trader Mobile
mobile.description: AGM Trader Mobile is a professional trading platform for mobile devices. It allows you to trade stocks, ETFs, options, futures, bonds, and more.

web_portal.title: AGM Web Portal
web_portal.description: AGM Web Portal is a web-based trading portal that allows you to manage your account, monitor your portfolio, and trade from any browser.

download.by_downloading: By downloading, you agree to our

modern_tools.title: Modern Tools for Modern Traders
modern_tools.description: We use industry grade technologies for fetching and processing real time market data to help us make informed decisions and maximize your growth. Try out some of our tools below to get started.

risk_profile.title: Risk Profile
risk_profile.description: Complete your personalized risk profile and receive a tailored investment proposal. We use your goals and risk tolerance to recommend the best strategy for you using real time market data.

portfolio_calculator.title: Portfolio Calculator
portfolio_calculator.description: Select your preferred assets and generate a customized investment proposal. Analyze potential returns and risks based on your asset allocation choices.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question_1: How to create a savings/investment account?
faq.question_2: What security measures do you offer?
faq.answer_2: Accounts are insured under the SIPC (Securities Investor Protection Corporation) and by Lloyd's in London. The accounts are under regulation of the SEC (Securities and Exchange Commission) and FINRA (Financial Industry Regulatory Authority) in the United States.
faq.question_3: What types of accounts are available at AGM?
faq.answer_3: Individual, joint, and corporate accounts. We serve both institutional and individual clients internationally.
faq.answer_4: After opening your account and making an initial savings/investment deposit, the money goes directly to the custodian in the USA that holds your AGM account in your name, you will have access to see and monitor your account 24/7.
faq.question_5: Are there any taxes to consider?
faq.answer_5: There are no interest or capital gains taxes on the account. Taxes are only charged on dividends received.
faq.question_6: Who can move the money in each account?
faq.answer_6: Only the account owner, the first designated person, can move the money in and out of the account to a bank account in the same name of the account owner. The custodian does not allow third party wires for the protection of the client.

title.description: Unlock the world of financial opportunities with your AGM account.

header.title: Application Form
header.description: Fill out the form below to apply for an account with us.

account_type.individual_description: An account owned and controlled by a single person
account_type.joint_description: An account owned and controlled by two people
account_type.institutional_description: An account owned and controlled by a company or organization

account_holder_info.margin_account_description: Margin accounts allow trading with borrowed funds and can support short selling, while cash accounts require paying fully for purchases and do not permit borrowing.
account_holder_info.same_mailing_address: Is mailing address the same as residence address?
account_holder_info.tin_help: Tax Identification Number issued by your tax authority.
account_holder_info.business_description_comment: Please provide a detailed description of your business.
account_holder_info.occupation_description_comment: Please provide a detailed description of your occupation.

regulatory.affiliation: Is the applicant or any immediate family member who resides in the same household, registered as a broker-dealer or an employee, director or owner of a securities or commodities brokerage firm?
regulatory.employee_pub_trade: Are the owners of, or other non-owners listed on, the account Employees of a publicly traded company?
regulatory.control_pub_traded: Do the owners of, or other non-owners listed on, the account Control a publicly traded company?
regulatory.affiliation_no: Applicant is not affiliated with a broker-dealer, director, or owner of a securities or commodities brokerage firm
regulatory.control_pub_traded_no: Applicant does not control a publicly traded company
regulatory.employee_pub_trade_no: Applicant is not an employee of a publicly traded company
regulatory.affiliation_yes: Applicant is affiliated with a broker-dealer, director, or owner of a securities or commodities brokerage firm
regulatory.control_pub_traded_yes: Applicant controls a publicly traded company
regulatory.employee_pub_trade_yes: Applicant is an employee of a publicly traded company
regulatory.company_stock_symbols_description: Enter one or more stock symbols separated by commas. Symbols must be UPPER CASE.

financial.net_worth_help: Include total assets minus total liabilities.
financial.liquid_net_worth_help: Include cash and assets easily converted to cash.
financial.annual_net_income_help: Your total income after taxes for the past year.
financial.investment_objectives_description: Select all that apply to this account
financial.trading_permissions_description: Specify which markets and products you want permission to trade
financial.estimated_deposit_help: Approximate amount you plan to deposit initially.

agreements.signature_error: Signature must exactly match the account holder's first and last name.

risk.title: Risk Assessment Questionnaire
risk.description: Please complete this form to help us understand your risk tolerance and investment preferences.

type.title: What type of investor do you consider yourself?

loss.title: If your portfolio loses 20% of its value, what action would you take?

gain.title: If your portfolio appreciates 20% of its value, what action would you take?

period.title: What do you think should be the average term of your investment portfolio?

diversification.title: Considering asset class diversification, which of these portfolios would you select?

goals.title: Which of these portfolios best represents your objectives with the most acceptable results?

result.title: Your Risk Profile
result.warning: Please take a picture of this, as it will be very difficult to see it again!

requirements.description: Please ensure you meet the following requirements to apply for an account

risk_profile.title: Complete Risk Profile
risk_profile.description: Fill out your investment risk profile to help us better understand your investment preferences and goals.

fees.title: Review Our Fees
fees.description: Explore our transparent pricing structure to understand the costs associated with your account.

downloads.title: Download Our Apps
downloads.description: Get access to our mobile and desktop applications for seamless trading on the go.

passport.title: Passport
passport.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, and expiration date.

id_card.title: Identification Document
id_card.description: Current and signed identification document from the country of residence and must include photograph, full name, date of birth, expiration date, and country of issuance.

driver_license.title: Driver's License
driver_license.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, expiration date, and place of issuance of the document.

utility_bill.title: Utility Bill
utility_bill.description: For example, bills for electricity, water, telephone, or gas services. Mobile phone service bills are not accepted. Bills must be clear, show the person's full name, complete address, and be less than one year old.

source_of_wealth.title: Source of Income
source_of_wealth.description: One of the following documents according to the Type of Income

documents.salary: Salaries (Copy of the most recent Employer Order or Certification by a CPA)
documents.investments: Income from Investment Gains (Brokerage Account Statement showing such gains)
documents.inheritance: Inheritance (Copy of Legal Document: Will, etc.)
documents.shares: Sale of Shares in one or more companies (Brokerage Account Statement showing such sales)
documents.dividends: Dividends received (Copy of Shareholders' Minutes authorizing Dividend distribution)

company_documents.title: Documents that prove the existence of the company

incorporation.title: Incorporation Act or Incorporation
incorporation.description: The document should clearly specify the name of the company as it appears in the opening documents, and should be certified and notarized.

legal_id.title: Legal ID
legal_id.description: The document should be issued by a Government authority, where it specifies the registration number, and also clearly specifies the name of the company as it appears in the opening documents

legal_status.title: Legal ID
legal_status.description: The document should clearly specify the name of the company as it appears in the opening documents, and should be certified and notarized. Valid: less than 6 months.

utility_bill.title: Utility Bill
utility_bill.description: For example, utility bills for internet, cable TV, electricity, water, gas, fixed telephone (mobile phone service bills are not accepted). The bill must clearly describe the full name of the company and the physical address. Must not be older than six months.

director_identification.title: Identification Documents of Directors
director_identification.description: President - Secretary and signatories (One of the following documents)

passport.title: Passport
passport.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, and expiration date.

id_card.title: Identification Document
id_card.description: Identification document from the country of residence, that includes the signature, date of birth, photograph of the person, full name, date of birth, expiration date, and country of issuance of the document.

driver_license.title: Driver's License
driver_license.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, expiration date, date and place of issuance.

director_address.title: Documents that indicate the physical address of the directors
director_address.description: President - Secretary and signatories (One of the following documents)

utility_bill.title: Utility Bill
utility_bill.description: For example, utility bills for internet, cable TV, electricity, water, fixed telephone (mobile phone service bills are not accepted). The bill must clearly describe the full name and address of the person and must be less than one year old.

capital_ownership.title: Document that proves the ownership of the Capital of the Company

documents.share_certificate: Certified copy of the Share Certificate(s) of the Company
documents.notarial_certification: Notarial certification of the Share Distribution of the Company

capital_ownership.note: If there are multiple shareholders, those with more than 10% must provide identification documents and documents that indicate their physical address.

source_of_wealth.title: Source of Income
source_of_wealth.description: One of the following documents according to the Type of Income

documents.investments: Income from Investment Gains: (Stock Exchange Account Statement showing such gains)
documents.inheritance: Inheritance: (Copy of Legal Document: Will, etc.)
documents.shares: Sale of Shares in one or more companies: (Stock Exchange Account Statement showing such sales)
documents.profits: Income from Profits: (Copy of Financial Statements of the Company showing such income)
documents.business: Income from Business: (Copy of Financial Statements of the Company showing such income)
documents.dividends: Dividends received: (Copy of Shareholders' Minutes authorizing Dividend distribution)

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: All costs are expressed in US dollars (USD) and may change at any time without prior notice.

managed_accounts.title: Managed accounts
managed_accounts.management_fees_value: Up to 2.5% per annum, fees are accrued daily over the Net Asset Value of the account and charged monthly.
managed_accounts.execution_costs_value: Stocks/ETFs: $0.075 per share, minimum of $25 per transaction. Bonds: $25 per transaction + 0.005% of the Face value
managed_accounts.other_fees_domestic: Domestic (Inside the USA): First Monthly Wire free, then $10 / wire
managed_accounts.other_fees_international: International: $25 + any fees charged by the receiving bank.

self_directed_accounts.title: Self Directed accounts
self_directed_accounts.execution_costs_value: Stocks/ETFs: $0.075 per share, minimum of $25 per transaction. Bonds: $25 per transaction + 0.005% of the Face value
self_directed_accounts.other_fees_domestic: Domestic (Inside the USA): First Monthly Wire free, then $10 / wire
self_directed_accounts.other_fees_international: International: $25 + any fees charged by the receiving bank.

fees.footnote: All of the costs and fees are in USD and can change at any moment without notice. Other costs or fees may apply. These charges and fees are the most common that apply to the most commonly used products and services. Stocks, ETFs and Bonds (Non Euroclear) might have additional charges.
